title: [Large-Scale] Personalized Online Language Education Design Based on Learning Analytics: Strengthening Workplace Communication Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and intermediate language proficiency (grammar, vocabulary, basic writing)
context.additional_context: Targeting administrators/leaders, this program aims to enhance language competencies required in work environments (formal presentations, negotiations, report writing). Applies a customized content recommendation system based on individual learning patterns and achievement data (participation rates, assessment results).

learning_goals: Learners can improve workplace language communication skills (speaking, listening, writing) by 30% within 6 months
Learners can receive weekly recommendations for at least two customized microlearning contents (vocabulary, grammar, expressions) through personalized learning data analysis
Learning gaps (reading comprehension, writing, pronunciation) can be diagnosed and supplemented every two weeks through formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
